section.h1: London to and from Heathrow Airport in 15 minutes every 15 minutes
section.p: The British Airport Authority's fast rail link between Paddington Station in West London and Heathrow Airport
Journey time of just 15 minutes from Paddington Station to Terminals 1, 2 & 3 and only 5/6 minutes more to Terminal 4.
Every 15 minutes, trains depart from platforms 6 & 7 at Paddington Station to the heart of the airport, 05.10-23.40 daily, 365 days a year.
Featuring air-conditioning, ergonomically designed seating and generous luggage space.
Highly-trained, friendly customer service representatives are on board the train to help with any information you may require.
Exclusive carriages with wider seats, tables and differentiated design, positioned for fastest access into the terminals.
Our own express TV, giving up-to-date news, sports, business and weather information.

Express Class: 18 pounds each way.First Class: 26 pounds each way.Returns are priced at two single fares.Frequent Flyer fare: 11 single, adult tickets for the price of 10. Available exclusively from Heathrow Express ticket offices.Special fares for children.

We recommend that you purchase your ticket before you board the train. This is made easy with our state-of-the-art ticket machines which are available en route to the trains at both Paddington and Heathrow, including the baggage reclaim areas. You can pay with key currencies and major credits cards and at Heathrow you can choose to have a ticket including travel on London Underground from Paddington. Tickets and assistance are also available from our desks at Heathrow and Paddington.
Purchasing tickets before you travel is made easy by our large number of agents:

section.p: We are committed to providing passengers with special needs easy access to our service. Our trains are level with the platforms and there are dedicated areas on board for wheelchairs. For more information on any of our services please call us on 0845 600 15 15 (only the cost of a local call) or visit our web site: www.heathrowexpress.co.uk
All details correct at time of going to press.
